summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of PhotoShare photo gallery application. Backend APIs are 100% functional (26/26 pytest tests passed). Frontend UI is working well with all major features functional. Minor UI issue with lightbox click handling on public gallery.

ui_bugs.issue: Hover overlay intercepts clicks on photo, preventing lightbox from opening. Download button works but clicking on photo area triggers download instead of lightbox.
ui_bugs.details: The overlay div with opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 is intercepting pointer events even when not visible. Consider adding pointer-events-none to the overlay when not hovered.

passed_tests: Backend: Public gallery access via share link (200)
Backend: Guest photo upload (200) - KEY FEATURE
Backend: Guest upload to protected gallery (200)
Frontend: Navigation to auth page works
Frontend: Registration form displays and submits
Frontend: Gallery detail page displays correctly
Frontend: Copy Share Link button present
Frontend: View Public Gallery button works
Frontend: Public gallery view loads correctly
Frontend: Guest upload section visible and expandable
Frontend: Guest uploads displayed in separate section
Frontend: Theme selection available in gallery creation
action_items: OPTIONAL: Fix lightbox click handling on PublicPhotoItem - add pointer-events-none to overlay when not hovered, or restructure click handling
critical_code_review_comments: All interactive elements have data-testid attributes
API endpoints properly handle errors with appropriate status codes
MongoDB _id is properly excluded from responses
Environment variables are used correctly for URLs
seed_data_creation: Test users and galleries created during testing with unique timestamps
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features are working: user auth, gallery CRUD, photo uploads (photographer and guest), public gallery access, share links, downloads. The lightbox component exists but has a minor click handling issue on public gallery - the hover overlay intercepts clicks. Backend is fully functional with 26 passing tests.

features_verified.premium_lightbox: PARTIAL - component exists, click handling issue
